title: Container Port Collision Incident
description: Production container failed to start due to port 8080 being used by another container.

title: Database Connection Timeout
description: Multiple services reported DB connection timeouts during peak hours.

title: K8s Pod CrashLoopBackOff
description: Pods keep restarting due to incorrect restartPolicy.

title: API Rate Limiting Alert
description: API throttling exceeded limits causing delayed responses.
